## EcdsaKey.passPhraseKey property

Generate a new key based on a passphrase and salt (this goes through the Warp wallet treatment [https://keybase.io/warp/warp\_1.0.9\_SHA256\_a2067491ab582bde779f4505055807c2479354633a2216b22cf1e92d1a6e4a87.html](https://keybase.io/warp/warp_1.0.9_SHA256_a2067491ab582bde779f4505055807c2479354633a2216b22cf1e92d1a6e4a87.html)<!-- -->)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static passPhraseKey: (phrase: Uint8Array, salt: Uint8Array) => Promise<EcdsaKey>;
```
